items.sentence: Could you at least tell me where we\'re going?
In all probability, we\'ll arrive before them.
Don\'t you want to know why I didn\'t do that?
I looked everywhere, but I couldn\'t find Tom.
I have two dogs, three cats, and six chickens.
Tom is just a little bit shorter than Mary is.
Tom is looking for an easy way to lose weight.
Tom is lying down in the back seat of his car.
Tom is lying on the couch, watching a TV show.
Tom is making Mary something for her birthday.
Tom could\'ve had this job if he\'d wanted it.
Tom couldn\'t answer all of Mary\'s questions.
Tom couldn\'t live up to Mary\'s expectations.
Would you have helped me if I\'d asked you to?
Tom doesn\'t care what people think about him.
Tom doesn\'t feel much like talking right now.
Tom doesn\'t get along with his father-in-law.
I hope I\'m not the only one who\'ll be there.
I thought that system was abolished last year.
I thought your dad took away your credit card.
